summary.title: summary
data: I have developed web and database applications in JavaScript and other languages. I am currently adding accessibility features to existing applications and developing new ones that comply with international accessibility standards.

data.head: Highlights
data.tail: Developed PostgreSQL database of 3.1 billion lexical translations/Developed UIs and SEO for database/Recruited steering committee and advisory committee/Hired and supervised 3 computational linguists and 1 linguist/Director 2 summer internship programs with 45 interns/Established project office

data.head: Synopsis
data.tail: Owner and operator of 4 office buildings with 100 tenants

data.head: Highlights
data.tail: Developed web application and UI for tenant-initiated leasing/Procured, configured, and managed 4-building wireless network with T1 WAN and Cisco LAN/Hired and supervised 20 employees/Upgraded physical plant to enhance ADA accessibility/Procured and managed lighting upgrade with 1.5-year payback

data.head: Synopsis
data.tail: Member of faculty of Department of Political Science

data.head: Highlights
data.tail: Published research articles, collections, and conference papers/Had visiting appointments at University of Paderborn and University of Bielefeld, Germany/Taught courses in research methods, decision theory, and language policy/Served on university committees

data.head: Company
data.tail: State University of New York at Stony Brook

data.head: Synopsis
data.tail: Member of faculty of Department of Political Science

data.head: Highlights
data.tail: Published research articles and conference papers/Had visiting appointments at Stanford University, McGill University, and University of Mannheim, Germany/Taught courses in research methods, comparative politics, and language policy/Developed instructional software

data.head: Synopsis
data.tail: Managed and improved access to corporate documentation

data.head: Highlights
data.tail: Digitized 52 years of corporate board minutes/Made 13,000 records web-accessible to authorized members/Documented extent and cost of construction defect, permitting corporation to recover $224,415 from contractors

data.head: Synopsis
data.tail: Taught ESL in Nevşehir and İstanbul, Turkey

data.head: Highlights
data.tail: Achieved 4.5 Foreign Service Institute score in Turkish/Published articles in Turkish periodicals/Authored language textbook for speakers of Turkish

data.head: Synopsis
data.tail: Worked on a binational team constructing a community center in Nsoatre, Ghana

data.head: Highlights
data.tail: Visited Côte d’Ivoire, Togo, Benin, and Nigeria

data.head: Courses
data.tail: computer programming (Java)/data structures and algorithms/user-interface design/artificial intelligence/syntax/morphology/semantics/lexical ambiguity/computational linguistics/grammar engineering/human rights law and philosophy

data.head: Courses
data.tail: computational political analysis/survey research on public opinion/political science methodology/political philosophy/comparative politics

data.head: Courses
data.tail: quantitative analysis of judicial behavior/political philosophy/comparative politics

data.head: Title
data.tail: Computer Simulation in Multilingual International Studies

data.head: Synopsis
data.tail: Cross-national policy simulation for students of politics

data.head: Title
data.tail: Computer Equipment for Experimental Political Science Research

data.head: Synopsis
data.tail: Laboratory for study of political behavior; co-principal investigator with Donald R. Matthews

data.head: Name
data.tail: Countering language attrition with PanLex and the Web of Data

data.head: Synopsis
data.tail: Transformation of PanLex database to RDF, linkage with Lexvo and DBpedia, and publication as Linked Data; co-author with Patrick Westphal and Claus Stadler

data.head: Name
data.tail: PanLex and LEXTRACT: Translating all Words of all Languages of the World

data.head: Publisher
data.tail: Coling 2010: 23rd International Conference on Computational Linguistics

data.head: Synopsis
data.tail: Research on expansion of coverage of PanLex, a lemmatic translation resource, via semi-automatic dictionary scraping; co-author with Timothy Baldwin and Susan M. Colowick

data.head: Synopsis
data.tail: Panlingual Translator, a prototype lemmatic machine-translation system; co-author with Stephen Soderland, Christopher Lim, Mausam, Bo Qin, and Oren Etzioni

data.head: Name
data.tail: Disambiguating for the Web: A Test of Two Methods

data.head: Publisher
data.tail: K-CAP 2007: Fourth International Conference on Knowledge Capture

data.head: Synopsis
data.tail: Paraphrasal disambiguation was more effective than truth-conditional disambiguation in an experiment with 386 subjects; co-author with Susan M. Colowick

data.head: Synopsis
data.tail: Proves in a mathematical model that it is possible to discover a fair and efficient policy on official languages even when language groups are willing to misrepresent the costs they would incur to use a nonnative official language

data.head: Name
data.tail: The Distribution of Foreign Language Skills as a Game Equilibrium

data.head: Publisher
data.tail: Game Equilibrium Models, ed. Reinhard Selten, vol. 4, Social and Political Interaction (Berlin: Springer)

data.head: Synopsis
data.tail: Proofs of relationships among learning aptitude, language difficulty, and personal benefit in a game model, suggesting that those who learn the hardest languages get the most profit; co-author with Reinhard Selten
